source: the princeton vase is a famous example of late classic maya ceramics in codex style , first published in m . d . thompson ' s ' the great maya and his contemporaries ' ( 1931 ) , and now a major piece of the pre - columbian collection of the national museum of mexico . originally painted as a drinking vessel for wine , it depicts a throne being approached by an owl , with an owl flying above him and by three young women surrounding him . in front of the throne a female dancer is being watched and threatened by two young men , a scene that has long been assumed to refer to an incident in the ahau san maya . as to the vase ' s art - historical importance , it invites comparison to the equally famous jaguar baby vase in the san francisco museum collection .
target: 普林斯顿花瓶是晚期经典期玛雅陶瓷以典册风格制作的著名范例，首次发表于 M. D. Thompson 的《伟大的玛雅人及其当代人》（1931 年），现为墨西哥国家博物馆前哥伦布时期收藏的重要藏品。该花瓶最初绘制为饮酒用的容器，描绘了一个宝座，有一只猫头鹰正向其靠近，另一只猫头鹰在他上方飞翔，三名年轻女子环绕其旁。宝座前，一名女性舞者正被两名年轻男子注视并威胁，这一场景长期被认为是指向阿豪三玛雅中的一宗事件。至于该花瓶的艺术史重要性，它引发人们将其与旧金山博物馆收藏的同样著名的美洲豹婴儿花瓶进行比较。

source: the princeton vase is a famous example of late classic maya ceramics in codex style , first published in m . d . thompson ' s ' the great maya and his contemporaries ' ( 1931 ) , and now a major piece of the pre - columbian collection of the national museum of mexico . originally painted as a drinking vessel for wine , it depicts a throne being approached by an owl , with an owl flying above him and by three young women surrounding him . in front of the throne a female dancer is being watched and threatened by two young men , a scene that has long been assumed to refer to an incident in the ahau san maya . as to the vase ' s art - historical importance , it invites comparison to the equally famous jaguar baby vase in the san francisco museum collection .
target: 普林斯顿瓶是晚期经典玛雅陶瓷中著名的编年体风格代表作，最早发表于M.D.汤普森的《伟大的玛雅及其同时代人》(1931年)，现为墨西哥国家博物馆前哥伦布时期收藏的重要展品。该瓶最初作为饮酒器具绘制，描绘了一位君主被一只猫头鹰接近的场景，君主头顶上方有一只飞翔的猫头鹰，身旁围绕着三位年轻女子。在王座前，一位女性舞者正被两位年轻男子注视并威胁，这一场景长期被认为指的是阿哈乌·桑玛雅的一个事件。关于该瓶的艺术史重要性，它常被拿来与旧金山博物馆收藏的同样著名的美洲豹幼崽瓶相提并论。

source: shannon is an unincorporated community in mason county , kentucky , united states . the village is southwest of mason city on u . s . route 40 , in the township of pine hill . the highest point in the community is dominated by a prominent limestone cliff and a mound built by the first settlers of the area . the original limestone lined earthwork is 2 ¹⁄₂ stories - high and 10 feet in diameter . historical holes in the mound have allowed further study and more precise dating of the mound ' s location . shannon is part of the mason city metropolitan statistical area statistical area .
target: 香农是美国肯塔基州梅森县的一个非建制社区。该村庄位于梅森市的西南方向，靠近美国40号公路，在松山乡。该社区的最高点由一个突出的石灰岩悬崖和一个由该地区最早的定居者建造的土墩组成。最初的石灰岩衬里的土方工程高约2¹⁄₂层，直径10英尺。土墩中的历史洞穴允许进一步研究和对土墩位置的更精确测定。香农是梅森城市区统计区的一部分。

source: Chargers ’ Jamal Williams Arrested For DUI on February 4 , 2009 Chargers defensive tackle Jamal Williams was arrested early Sunday for suspicions of driving under the influence . Williams was pulled over by the California Highway Patrol for speeding in a San Diego freeway . He was given a blood alcohol test but the results have not been revealed . source: The January 2010 Rio de Janeiro floods and mudslides was an extreme weather event that affected the State of Rio de Janeiro in Brazil in the first days of January 2010 . at least 85 people died , with at least 29 people in the hotel sankey after it was destroyed by landslides , and many more have been injured . More than 4,000 people were forced to evacuate their homes . The worst affected municipality was Angra dos Reis , about southwest of the city of Rio de Janeiro . At least 35 people were killed at a resort on Ilha Grande : about forty people were staying in the hotel which was buried under a mudslide , and the death toll is expected to rise further . Brazil 's only functioning nuclear power plant , Central Nuclear Almirante Álvaro Alberto , is also located within the municipality : plans were made for a temporary shutdown , as blocked roads would make any evacuation difficult or impossible in the event of an incident at the plant . In Rio Grande do Sul , at least seven people died and 20 went missing after a bridge collapsed due to heavy rains .
target: 2010年1月，里约热内卢的洪水和泥石流是一场极端天气事件，发生在2010年1月初的巴西里约热内卢州。至少有85人死亡，其中至少29人在桑凯酒店被摧毁后遇难，还有更多人受伤。超过4000人被迫使撤离他们的家园。受灾最严重的市镇是安格拉多斯雷斯，位于里约热内卢市的西南方向。在伊尔哈格兰德岛的一个度假村，至少有35人丧生：约四十人在酒店入住，该酒店被泥石流掩埋，预计死亡人数还会进一步上升。巴西唯一的核电站，阿尔米兰特阿尔瓦罗·阿尔贝托核电站，也位于该市镇内：计划进行临时关闭，因为道路受阻将使任何疏散在电站发生事故时变得困难或不可能。在南里奥格兰德州，至少有七人死亡，20人失踪，原因是由于大雨导致一座桥梁坍塌。

source: The Contribution of a Speech Perception Intervention to the Prevention of Phonological Awareness Deficits in Children With Speech Sound Disorders | Recent research reveals genetic and symptomatic overlap among children with speech sound disorders (i.e., those who (misarticulate more sounds than would be expected for their age) and children with dyslexia (i.e., those who struggle to learn to read). Children who have speech sound disorders as preschoolers are at risk for the later emergence of dyslexia, a risk that often reveals itself in the form of poor phonological awareness skills during the preschool period. Traditional speech therapy methods focus on articulation accuracy and do not focus on the child's more abstract knowledge of the sound system of the language. The ultimate objective of this research program is to prevent reading disability in children who present with speech sounds disorders. The relative effectiveness of different interventions to help these children achieve age-appropriate phonological processing skills prior to school entry will be investigated. It is expected that a combination of treatment approaches that focus on speech perception skills and vocabulary knowledge will have a superior impact on phonological awareness in comparison with a treatment approach that focuses solely on articulation accuracy.
target: 语音感知干预对预防患有语音障碍儿童语音意识缺陷的贡献 | 最新研究显示，患有语音障碍（即发音错误超过其年龄预期的儿童）与患有阅读障碍（即学习阅读困难的儿童）之间存在遗传和症状上的重叠。作为学龄前儿童，患有语音障碍的儿童存在之后出现阅读障碍的风险，这种风险通常表现为学龄前三期语音意识技能较差。传统的言语治疗方法侧重于发音准确性，而不关注儿童对语言声音系统更抽象的认知。该研究项目的最终目标是预防患有语音障碍儿童的阅读障碍。本研究将调查不同干预措施在帮助这些儿童在入学前实现与年龄相符的语音处理技能方面的相对效果。预计聚焦语音感知技能和词汇知识的组合治疗方法相比于仅侧重发音准确性的治疗方法，在提升语音意识方面具有更优越的效果。

source: Intravenous sodium valproate versus diazepam infusion for the control of refractory status epilepticus in children : a randomized controlled trial . An open-label , randomized controlled study was conducted at a tertiary care teaching hospital to compare efficacy and safety of intravenous sodium valproate versus diazepam infusion for control of refractory status epilepticus . Forty children with refractory status epilepticus were randomized to receive either intravenous sodium valproate or diazepam infusion . Refractory status epilepticus was controlled in 80 % of the valproate and 85 % of the diazepam patients . The median time to control refractory status epilepticus was less in the valproate group ( 5 minutes ) than the diazepam group ( 17 minutes ; P $lt; .001 ) . None of the patients in the valproate group required ventilation or developed hypotension , whereas in the diazepam group 60 % required ventilation and 50 % developed hypotension after starting diazepam infusion . No adverse effects on liver functions were seen with valproate . It is concluded that intravenous sodium valproate is an effective alternative to diazepam infusion in controlling refractory status epilepticus in children and is free of respiratory depression and hypotension .
target: 静脉输注丙戊酸钠与地西泮输注用于控制儿童的难治性持续状态癫痫：一项随机对照试验。为了比较静脉输注丙戊酸钠与地西泮输注控制难治性持续状态癫痫的疗效和安全性，在一所三级教学医院进行了一项开放标签、随机对照研究。四十名患有难治性持续状态癫痫的儿童被随机分配接受静脉输注丙戊酸钠或地西泮输注。丙戊酸钠组和地西泮组分别在 80% 和 85% 的患者中控制了难治性持续状态癫痫。丙戊酸钠组控制难治性持续状态癫痫的中位时间（5 分钟）短于地西泮组（17 分钟；P $lt; .001）。丙戊酸钠组的患者均未需要呼吸机支持或出现低血压，而地西泮组有 60% 的患者在开始地西泮输注后需要呼吸机支持，50% 的患者出现低血压。丙戊酸钠未见对肝功能产生不良影响。结论认为，静脉输注丙戊酸钠是控制儿童难治性持续状态癫痫的有效替代方案，且无呼吸抑制和低血压的风险。

source: The Letter from Birmingham Jail , also known as the Letter from Birmingham City Jail and The Negro Is Your Brother , is an open letter written on April 16 , 1963 , by Martin Luther King Jr . The letter defends the strategy of nonviolent resistance to racism . It says that people have a moral responsibility to break unjust laws and to take direct action rather than waiting potentially forever for justice to come through the courts . Responding to being referred to as an `` outsider , '' King writes , `` Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere '' . The letter , written during the 1963 Birmingham campaign , was widely published , and became an important text for the American Civil Rights Movement .
target: 《伯明翰监狱来信》（又称《伯明翰市监狱来信》和《黑人兄弟》）是马丁·路德·金于 1963 年 4 月 16 日撰写的一封公开信。信中为以非暴力方式抵制种族主义的策略进行了辩护。信中指出，人们有道德责任打破不公正的法律，并采取直接行动，而不是可能永远等待司法部门带来正义。针对被称作“外来者”，金写道：“任何地方的不公正都是对任何地方公正的威胁。”这封信是在 1963 年伯明翰运动期间写成的，被广泛发表，成为美国民权运动的重要文献。

source: The Letter from Birmingham Jail , also known as the Letter from Birmingham City Jail and The Negro Is Your Brother , is an open letter written on April 16 , 1963 , by Martin Luther King Jr . It says that people have a moral responsibility to break unjust laws and to take direct action rather than waiting potentially forever for justice to come through the courts . Responding to being referred to as an `` outsider , '' King writes , `` Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere '' . The letter , written during the 1963 Birmingham campaign , was widely published , and became an important text for the American Civil Rights Movement .
target: 《伯明翰监狱的信》（又称《伯明翰市监狱的信》和《黑人是你的兄弟》）是马丁·路德·金于1963年4月16日撰写的一封公开信。该信为以非暴力抵抗种族主义的策略进行了辩护。信中指出，人们有道德责任打破不公正的法律，并采取直接行动，而不是可能永远等待司法系统带来正义。针对被称作“外人”的说法，金写道：“任何地方的不公正都是对任何地方正义的威胁。”这封信是在1963年伯明翰运动期间撰写的，被广泛刊登，成为美国民权运动的重要文献。

source: Mohenjo - daro was built in the 26th century BCE . It was one of the largest cities of the ancient Indus Valley Civilization , also known as the Harappan Civilization , which developed around 3,000 BCE from the prehistoric Indus culture . At its height , the Indus Civilization spanned much of what is now Pakistan and North India , extending westwards to the Iranian border , south to Gujarat in India and northwards to an outpost in Bactria , with major urban centers at Harappa , Mohenjo - daro , Lothal , Kalibangan , Dholavira and Rakhigarhi . Mohenjo - daro was the most advanced city of its time , with remarkably sophisticated civil engineering and urban planning . When the Indus civilization went into sudden decline around 1900 BCE , Mohenjo - daro was abandoned . The ruins of the city remained undocumented for around 3,700 years until R.D. Banerji , an officer of the Archaeological Survey of India , visited the site in 1919 -- 20 , identifying the Buddhist stupa ( 150 -- 500 CE ) known to be there and finding a flint scraper which convinced him of the site 's antiquity . This led to large - scale excavations of Mohenjo - daro led by Kashinath Narayan Dikshit in 1924 -- 25 , and John Marshall in 1925 -- 26 . In the 1930s , major excavations were conducted at the site under the leadership of Marshall , D.K. Dikshitar and Ernest Mackay . Further excavations were carried out in 1945 by Ahmad Hasan Dani and Mortimer Wheeler . The last major series of excavations were conducted in 1964 and 1965 by Dr. George F. Dales .
target: 摩亨佐-达罗建于公元前26世纪。它是古代印度河流域文明中最大的城市之一，该文明也被称为哈拉帕文明，起源于公元前3000年左右的史前印度河文化。在其鼎盛时期，印度河文明覆盖了现今巴基斯坦和印度北部的大部分地区，向西延伸至伊朗边境，向南延伸至印度的古吉拉特邦，向北延伸至巴克特里亚的一个前哨，主要城市包括哈拉帕、摩亨佐-达罗、洛塔尔、卡利班甘、多拉维拉和拉基加尔希。摩亨佐-达罗是当时最先进的城市，拥有极其复杂的土木工程和城市规划。当印度河文明在公元前1900年左右突然衰落时，摩亨佐-达罗被废弃。该城废墟在未经记录的状态下保持了约3700年，直到印度考古局官员R.D. Banerji于1919年至1920年访问该遗址，他确认了已知存在的佛教佛塔（公元150至500年）并发现了一块燧石刮刀，确信该遗址的古老性。这促使Kashinath Narayan Dikshit于1924至1925年领导了摩亨佐-达罗的大规模发掘工作，随后John Marshall于1925至1926年继续发掘。1930年代，Marshall、D.K. Dikshitar和Ernest Mackay领导下在该遗址进行了重大发掘。1945年，Ahmad Hasan Dani和Mortimer Wheeler进行了进一步的发掘。而1964年和1965年，Dr. George F. Dales主持了最后一轮重要发掘。

In the 1930s , major excavations were conducted at the site under the leadership of Marshall , D.K. Dikshitar and Ernest Mackay . Further excavations were carried out in 1945 by Ahmad Hasan Dani and Mortimer Wheeler . The last major series of excavations were conducted in 1964 and 1965 by Dr. George F. Dales .
target: 摩亨佐-达罗建于公元前26世纪。它是古代印度河流域文明中最大的城市之一，该文明也被称为哈拉帕文明，起源于公元前3000年左右的史前印度河文化。在其鼎盛时期，印度河文明覆盖了现今巴基斯坦和北印度的大部分地区，向西延伸至伊朗边界，向南延伸至印度古吉拉特邦，向北延伸至巴克特里亚的前哨站，主要城市中心有哈拉帕、摩亨佐-达罗、罗塔尔、卡利班根、多拉维拉和拉基加尔希。摩亨佐-达罗是当时最先进的城市，拥有极为精密的土木工程和城市规划。约公元前1900年印度河文明突然衰落，摩亨佐-达罗被废弃。该城市遗址在未被记录的状态下保存了约3700年，直到1919年至1920年间，印度考古调查局官员R.D.巴内尔吉拜访该遗址，确定了那里存在的佛教佛塔（公元150至500年），并发现了一把燧石刮刀，使他确信该遗址的古老性。此后，卡西纳斯·纳拉扬·迪克希特于1924至1925年和约翰·马歇尔于1925至1926年领导了对摩亨佐-达罗的大规模发掘。1930年代，马歇尔、D.K.迪克希塔和欧内斯特·麦凯领导了该遗址的主要发掘。1945年，艾哈迈德·哈桑·达尼和莫提默·惠勒进行了进一步发掘。1964年和1965年，乔治·F·戴尔斯博士进行了最后一轮大型发掘。

source: Jens Oliver Lisberg ( 24 December 1896 – 31 August 1920 ) ( Jens Olivur Lisberg in modern Faroese ) is one of the designers of the Merkið , the flag of the Faroe Islands . While a law student in Copenhagen , he devised the flag in 1919 with two other Faroese students , Janus Øssursson from Tórshavn and Paul Dahl from Vágur . Lisberg raised the flag for the first time on Faroese soil on 22 June 1919 on returning to his home town of Fámjin . It would not however receive official status until 25 April 1940 when the British occupation government approved its use as the civil ensign of the islands . Lisberg died of pneumonia on 31 August 1920 . He is buried in Fámjin , where the church now holds the original copy of the Merkið .
target: Jens Oliver Lisberg（1896年12月24日－1920年8月31日）（现代法罗语中称为Jens Olivur Lisberg）是Merkið（法罗群岛的旗帜）的设计者之一。在哥本哈根念法律专业时，他于1919年与另外两名法罗学生Janus Øssursson（来自托尔斯港）和Paul Dahl（来自瓦古尔）共同设计了这面旗帜。Lisberg于1919年6月22日回到家乡Fámjin时，首次在法罗土地上升起了这面旗帜。然而，该旗帜直到1940年4月25日，被英国占领政府批准作为该群岛的民用旗帜时才获得官方地位。Lisberg于1920年8月31日死于肺炎，安葬于Fámjin，当地教堂现藏有这面Merkið的原件。

source: Jens Oliver Lisberg ( 24 December 1896 – 31 August 1920 ) ( Jens Olivur Lisberg in modern Faroese ) is one of the designers of the Merkið , the flag of the Faroe Islands . While a law student in Copenhagen , he devised the flag in 1919 with two other Faroese students , Janus Øssursson from Tórshavn and Paul Dahl from Vágur . Lisberg raised the flag for the first time on Faroese soil on 22 June 1919 on returning to his home town of Fámjin . It would not however receive official status until 25 April 1940 when the British occupation government approved its use as the civil ensign of the islands . Lisberg died of pneumonia on 31 August 1920 . He is buried in Fámjin , where the church now holds the original copy of the Merkið .
target: 延斯·奥利弗·利斯贝格（Jens Oliver Lisberg，1896年12月24日－1920年8月31日）（现代法罗语称Jens Olivur Lisberg）是法罗群岛旗帜“Merkið”的设计者之一。1919年，他在哥本哈根作为一名法律系学生，与另外两名法罗群岛学生——来自托尔斯港的贾纳斯·厄苏尔森（Janus Øssursson）和来自瓦乌尔的保罗·达尔（Paul Dahl）——共同设计了这面旗帜。1919年6月22日，利斯贝格首次在法罗群岛本土的法姆因镇升起了这面旗帜。然而，直到1940年4月25日，英国占领政府批准其作为法罗群岛民用旗帜使用时，该旗帜才获得官方认可。利斯贝格于1920年8月31日因肺炎去世，葬于法姆因教堂内，教堂现收藏有“Merkið”的原始版本。
